amendment.description: To set aside an amount for coproduction of the Arrow Ballistic missile defense system.

vote.text: Amendment SA 760 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 760 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Cochran. (consideration: CR S6896; text: CR S6896) To set aside an amount for coproduction of the Arrow Ballistic missile defense system.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 760 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 760 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Cochran.
